alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andalusia, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Andalusia, San Mateo and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
